content: free pattern to say thank you to the supporters and crafters on my design journey - this is a beautiful crochet pattern designed with love our patterns are written in a way that is easily read and understood we use 4mm crochet hook dk yarn & american crochet terminology we also provide lots of support and help for all questions so this is perfect for beginners or the more advanced crocheter pattern will be downloadable after purchase and are pdf file © spitspotcrochet this crochet pattern is designed by spitspot the pattern is for personal use only and may not be published in any way you are allowed to sell the item as long as you give credit to us as the designer if you have a question about the pattern please send an email to spitspotcrochet at gmail com
